title: Who am I? Chinese
body:
Who am I? written in Chinese to make bit harder
我叫____。我的眼睛很小， 黄色。 我眉毛瘦, 我高。 我的下吧很锐。我的斗篷紫色.   
'simple sentences not put into context well and the grammar is bad, but you get the idea when you translate it, put up translation and answer on Sunday (if not gotten)

also, putting it in google translate would prove difficult, that thing only has 20% accuracy for everything too.

replies.body: Azir
HAHAHA I FUCKING GUESSED IT FROM 1 CLUE USING GOOGLE TRANSLATE.
Azir has a blue coat then? I was totally going to go for azir
his tentacle things are more maroon, and he doesn't weak a cloak

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EyedEkE2,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2015-05-29T12:31:45.356+0000)
>
> his tentacle things are more maroon, and he doesn't weak a cloak

I haven't seen his spash art since release lol, but yeah now that I remember he doesn't
he's asian right?
obviously urgot
I think it is kevin bacon.

你句子的結構與語法不是很好 (我猜你可說及格吧)，需改進。


EDIT: deleted the second paragraph because I completely missed the point and I ended up as the rude one here, I apologise.

I really have trouble finding a champ who is matching all the descriptions tbh.
and I said it wasn't going to be
talon

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EyedEkE2,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-29T04:09:00.321+0000)
>
> talon

how does talon match that description
the description said purple cloak. Talon is actually taller than most other champs. His eyes are yellowish n the splash, his eyebrows are also thin.

> [{quoted}](name=Sora NGNL,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EyedEkE2,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-05-29T04:43:14.927+0000)
>
> how does talon match that description

i don't speak chinese and it said purple cloak or something in google translate. random guess mostly.

yup ding ding
We speak English in OCE.
